line_2: And warmer too, than He that drives.

line_1: Alas! full soon the eve of life arrives,
line_2: Short is the summer of the happiest lives,

line_1: Soft Peace She brings where-ever She arrives:
line_2: She builds our Quiet, as She forms our Lives;

line_1: But Death approaches e'er the Man arrives.
line_2: To dispossess the Child the Mortal lives,

line_1: Who tells them when the very Month arrives?
line_2: And who the secret Order gives?
